Faults.message: We're sorry for the loss of supply. The reason you're currently without power is a planned outage in the areas listed. We have turned off your electricity supply to allow us to safely carry out essential work to our electrical equipment. By doing this, it'll help us to improve the reliability of our service to you for the future. If you have any questions or require more information, please call us on 105 or send us a message on Facebook or Twitter (@ssencommunity) with reference '221531'. You will have received a letter from us confirming your power will be interrupted with specific information relating to your property. If you did not receive this letter, you can assume your power will not be interrupted.

Faults.message:
We're sorry for the power cut affecting your area. Our teams are working hard to get the power restored, however, due to the high wind speeds and bad weather conditions, this is making it harder than normal to get the power back on.

A mixture of difficulties including damage to our network and travel restrictions means that it may take longer than you'd expect to get the power back on, but we promise we're doing everything we can to get the lights back on sooner.

The restoration time above is based on our current progress, but this may change as the situation evolves - we will update that time here if anything changes. You can also register for updates too. If you require any additional support or advice, please call us on 105.
